title: Google\Cloud\DataFusion\V1\CryptoKeyConfig
name: CryptoKeyConfig
description:
The crypto key configuration. This field is used by the Customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK) feature.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datafusion.v1.CryptoKeyConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.key_reference
params.description: The name of the key which is used to encrypt/decrypt customer data. For key in Cloud KMS, the key should be in the format of projects/*/locations/*/keyRings/*/cryptoKeys/*.

methods.name: getKeyReference
methods.description:
